title: Composition
text: Remember that to solve g(f(x)), we need to plug in the value of f(x) into the value of $$x$$ in g(x).

title: Composition
text: We need to plug in f(x), or $$2x^2+1$$, for the $$x$$ in the function g: $$3\left(2x^2+1\right)+5$$.
speech: We need to plug in f(x), or  2 x squared, plus 1 , for the  x  in the function g:  3 times, parentheses, 2 x squared, plus 1  plus 5 .

in the function g:   3 times, , 2 x squared, plus 1  plus 5

title: Multiplication
text: Based off the Order of Operations, the first step is the multiply and distribute the 3: $$6x^2+3-5$$.
speech: Based off the Order of Operations, the first step is the multiply and distribute the 3: , 6 x squared, plus 3 minus 5 .
pacedSpeech: Based off the Order of Operations, the first step is the multiply and distribute the 3:  , 6 x squared, plus 3 minus 5

title: Subtraction
text: Now, our composition function reads $$6x^2+3-5$$. The next step is to subtract: $$6x^2+3-5=6x^2-2$$.
speech: Now, our composition function reads  6 x squared, plus 3 minus, 5 . The next step is to subtract:  6 x squared plus 3 minus 5 is equal to, 6 x squared, minus 2 .

. The next step is to subtract:   6 x squared plus 3 minus 5 is equal to, 6 x squared, minus 2
